id: New Blue Jays manager Montoyo says team looks like ‘fun’ to coach
paragraph: The subject who is truly loyal to the Chief Magistrate will neither advise nor submit to arbitrary measures. New Blue Jays manager Charlie Montoyo says having “respect” for players is among his top qualities. Toronto introduced the former Tampa Bay bench coach on Monday as the replacement for John Gibbons, who left after last season.
